recipesJson.name: Katy Pearry
recipesJson.author: ID10-T
recipesJson.description: A peachy Honey Pearry remix. This is a full-flavored vape that's round and juicy and sweet and tastes like a Teenage Dream.

reviews.text: I get a really off flavor from TPA Pear (it literally makes me feel ill), so I subbed in FA Pear for this.  I really enjoy it this way, and wouldn't say it changes the flavor profile much.  Highly recommend it as a summertime vape.
